sections.heading: S2. Ep6. Talking with David Down about his experiences as an Estimator

sections.content: In this podcast episode, we talked with +[David Down](https://www.linkedin.com/in/david-down-9117299/)+ – a vastly experienced Senior Estimator who has worked within some of Melbourne's most iconic builders and currently pricing some of the largest towers hitting our skyline at +[Crema Group](https://www.crema.com.au/)+.

We spoke about how he started his career in the construction industry, his experiences in estimating, and how he became a well-renowned Estimator. We also talked about his previous projects, the pressures and challenges of being an Estimator, and how he overcame them.
Amongst other things, in this podcast we discussed:

items: Building and having a good relationship with subcontractors
Risks and the challenges the construction industry is facing
The projects that he had priced over the course of his career

sections.content: If you have an interest in the Melbourne building industry, building and developing a company within the industry, or have an interest in what takes place within a business of this size, then have a listen.
